        @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#contact, admin)")

      • create

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\')")
void create(Contact contact)

      • delete

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#contact, \'delete\') or hasPermission(#contact, admin)")
void delete(Contact contact)

      • getAll

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_USER\')")
 @PostFilter(value="hasPermission(filterObject, \'read\') or hasPermission(filterObject, admin)")
java.util.List<Contact> getAll()
